subject: Figure Skating
Fashion and Apparel
Olympic Games (2014)
lead_paragraph: Of the people working behind the scenes at the national figure skating championships, few provide a more urgent service than the seamstresses and technicians who repair costumes and skates.
snippet: Of the people working behind the scenes at the national figure skating championships, few provide a more urgent service than the seamstresses and technicians who repair costumes and skates.
